attributes.action: Stop the rich landlords to repossess the businesses in Covid-19
attributes.additional_details: It will help society to be more equal and fair.
attributes.background: Making it illegal to destroy good small businesses who are paying rent even during pandemic. Especially rich landlord family with parliamentary background to using the system to exploit and discriminate ethic minorities by taking their money

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about small businesses failing, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
